name: $link-padding
description: Padding inside links.

name: atom/link
description: an inline link

name: TextExcerptToggle#getPositionClass()
description: Helper function to determine current orientation of TextExcerptToggle pane.

name: TextExcerptToggle#open()
description: Opens the TextExcerptToggle pane, and fires a bubbling event to close other TextExcerptToggle.

name: TextExcerptToggle#close()
description: Closes the open TextExcerptToggle pane.

name: TextExcerptToggle#toggle()
description: Toggles the TextExcerptToggle pane's visibility.

name: TextExcerptToggle#_destroy()
description: Destroys the TextExcerptToggle.

name: closeme
description: Fires to close other open TextExcerptToggle, typically when TextExcerptToggle is opening

name: show
description: Fires once the TextExcerptToggle is visible.

name: hide
description: Fires once the TextExcerptToggle is no longer visible.

name: parentClass
description: Class that designates bounding container of TextExcerptToggle (default: window)

name: hoverDelay
description: Amount of time to delay opening a submenu on hover event.

name: hover
description: Allow submenus to open on hover events

name: hoverPane
description: Don't close TextExcerptToggle when hovering over TextExcerptToggle pane

name: vOffset
description: Number of pixels between the TextExcerptToggle pane and the triggering element on open.

name: hOffset
description: Number of pixels between the TextExcerptToggle pane and the triggering element on open.

name: positionClass
description: Class applied to adjust open position. JS will test and fill this in.

name: trapFocus
description: Allow the plugin to trap focus to the TextExcerptToggle pane if opened with keyboard commands.

name: autoFocus
description: Allow the plugin to set focus to the first focusable element within the pane, regardless of method of opening.

name: closeOnClick
description: Allows a click on the body to close the TextExcerptToggle.

name: $link-font-family
description: Font family for link elements.

name: TextExcerptToggle()
description: Creates a new instance of a Siteapp.TextExcerptToggle.

name: $link-margin
description: Margin around links.

name: $link-fill
description: Default fill for links. Can either be solid` or `hollow`.

name: $link-background
description: Default background color for links.

name: $link-background-hover
description: Background color on hover for links.

name: $link-color
description: Font color for links.

name: $link-color-alt
description: Alternative font color for links.

name: $link-radius
description: Border radius for links, defaulted to global-radius.

name: $link-hollow-border-width
description: Border width for hollow outline links

name: $link-sizes
description: Sizes for links.

name: $link-palette
description: Coloring classes. A map of classes to output in your CSS, like .secondary`, `.success`, and so on.

name: $link-opacity-disabled
description: opacity for a disabled link.

name: $link-background-hover-lightness
description: Background color lightness on hover for links.

name: $link-hollow-hover-lightness
description: Color lightness on hover for hollow links.

name: $link-transition
description: transitions for links.

name: link-expand()
description: Expands a link to make it full-width.

name: link-style()
description: Sets the visual style of a link.

name: link-hollow()
description: Removes background fill on hover and focus for hollow links.

name: link-disabled()
description: Adds disabled styles to a link by fading the element, reseting the cursor, and disabling pointer events.

name: link-dropdown()
description: Adds a dropdown arrow to a link.

name: link()
description: Adds all styles for a link. For more granular control over styles, use the individual link mixins.
